title: The Welsh Serial Killer
description: Today, we head to North Wales in the mid 1990's where three dead men are found in quick succession.  Is there a link?  Is there a killer, or killers, murdering gay men in the area?  In this episode of the weekly UK True Crime Podcast we go back to 1995 to look back at four months of terror.
